(terhadap hari kebangkitan, apa yang telah diperbuat oleh Rabb kalian) berupa kemusyrikan (dan apa yang telah kalian kerjakan) berupa kemusyrikan dan lain-lainnya (sebagai janji yang benar) lafal ayat ini berkedudukan menjadi badal dari lafal 'amil sebelumnya dengan mengulangi huruf jarnya (dan Dia telah menciptakan kalian) hai penduduk Mekah (dalam keadaan yang tetap) berada dalam kalbu, lafal ayat ini berkedudukan menjadi badal dari lafal yaum (dan Dia telah menyempurnakan untuk kalian amal-amal kalian) yakni pahala amal-amal kalian (dan adalah malaikat-malaikat) yakni malaikat-malaikat itu (yang di atas kalian sekali-kali tidak lengahkan) kemusyrikan (terhadap apa yang kalian kerjakan) kemusyrikan dan orang-orang yang lain.

question_en: On the Day of Judgment, no one can benefit anyone else, and the matter rests solely with Allah, who cannot be defeated, nor can anyone overpower Him or challenge Him. Recall the noble verse that indicates this meaning.
answer_en: On that day, no soul will have power over another, and all matters will be in Allah's control. (Al-Infitaar 19)
question_id: (Ingatlah) hari (ketika) seseorang tidak berdaya sedikitpun untuk menolong orang lain. Dan sesungguhnya urusan itu terserah kepada Allah, tidak ada yang dapat mengalahkan-Nya dan tidak (pula) dapat mengalahkan-Nya.
answer_id: Maka pada hari itu terjadilah keadaan yang seperti itu. Tak ada seorang pun yang menyiksa seperti siksaan Allah, dan tak ada seorang pun yang mengikat seperti ikatan-Nya.

question_en: Who are the Muthaffifin? And what has Allah (SWT) prepared for them?
answer_en: They are those who, when they buy from people, give less than the full measure, and when they sell, take more than the full measure. Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment, or a painful chastisement in Hell, which is called Al-Muflihin.
question_id: (Apakah yang menghalangi mereka) dari menyembah berhala-berhala (dan apakah yang telah disediakan bagi mereka) maksudnya, apakah yang telah ditentukan untuk mereka (oleh Allah) untuk menerima pembalasan dari-Nya (padahal mereka tidak mengetahui?) hal tersebut.
answer_id: (Yaitu orang-orang) menjadi badal atau na'at bagi orang-orang munafik (yang apabila mereka membeli sesuatu dari manusia mereka, mereka tidak mencukupkan takaran dan tidak pula menguranginya) tidak menambahnya (sedikit pun) dengan menambah dan tidak melebihkannya dari mereka. (Allah menyediakan bagi mereka azab yang pedih) atau azab yang menyakitkan (atau azab yang pedih) yang menyakitkan, yaitu neraka.

question_en: Explain these noble verses. 'No indeed! The record of the wretched is in Sijjin. And what will make you know what Sijjin is? A inscribed book.' (The Defrauders 7-9)
answer_en: Indeed, the fate of the wicked and their abode is in a narrow place (and it is said that a prisoner is a collection of the works of the devils and the infidels, and it is a place below the seventh earth, and it is the abode of Iblis and his soldiers), and what do you know about this narrowness? It is a permanent prison and a severe punishment, and it is the fate that has been written for them, written, sealed, and completed, neither increased nor decreased.
question_id: (Sekali-kali tidak demikian) kalimat ini mengandung makna hardikan dan cegahan terhadap perkataan mereka yang demikian itu (sebenarnya telah ada dalam) telah tertera (kesesatan) yakni kesesatan (bagi orang-orang yang berdosa) yakni orang-orang kafir Mekah. (Dan tahukah kamu apakah sijjiin itu?) maksudnya apakah kitab sijjiin itu?
answer_id: (Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang berdosa) seperti Abu Jahal dan lain-lainnya (dan tempat kediaman mereka) tempat mereka kembali (ada tempat kediaman yang sempit) tempat yang sempit; lafal 'Ibaan adalah bentuk jamak dari lafal 'Umatun, yang artinya tempat yang sempit; bentuk jamak dari lafal Thariiqah, yaitu tempat yang banyak dipakai oleh orang-orang Arab (dan apa yang kamu ketahui) tempat kediaman mereka (adalah penjara) tempat berlindung (dan siksaan yang berat) siksaan yang paling keras (disebabkan kelaliman mereka) sebab mereka mendustakan rasul-rasul mereka, yaitu sebagaimana yang telah disebutkan dalam ayat lain, "Apakah gerangan yang terjadi terhadap kamu katakan itu?" (ini) yakni Alquran (adalah suatu kitab yang di bawahnya ada kitab) yakni Lohmahfuz.

answer_en: The matter is not as the disbelievers claim, rather, on the Day of Judgment, they will be prevented from seeing their Lord, the Most High. And in this verse, there is evidence that the believers will see their Lord in Paradise.
question_id: - Ya.
answer_id: (Tidaklah mungkin orang-orang kafir itu mengatakan, "Sesungguhnya Rabb mereka ialah Tuhan kami, Yang Maha Tinggi") di atas semua makhluk-Nya (Dan di dalam ayat-ayat itu) yakni Alquran (ada tanda-tanda) yang menunjukkan akan kekuasaan-Nya (bahwa orang-orang mukmin akan melihat Rabb mereka di dalam surga.)

question_en: No indeed! Surely the Book of the righteous is in 'Illiyin. And what will make you know what 'Illiyin is? A written record, witnessed by those brought near.
answer_en: Indeed, the Book of the Pious (the righteous) - who are the God-fearing - is among the highest ranks in Paradise. It is said that it is a comprehensive record of good deeds by the angels and the believers of heavy weight. It is also said to be a place in the seventh heaven, under the Throne. And how would you know, O Messenger, what these high ranks are? The Book of the Pious is written, sealed, and complete; nothing is added to it or taken away from it. Only the intimate angels of each heaven can access it.
question_id: (Sekali-kali tidak) artinya benarlah (sesungguhnya kitab orang-orang berbakti itu) yaitu kitab catatan amal perbuatan orang-orang mukmin yang imannya benar-benar ikhlas (berada dalam 'Illiyyiin) menurut suatu pendapat 'Illiyyiin adalah nama kitab yang mencatat semua amal kebaikan para malaikat dan orang-orang yang beriman dari kalangan manusia dan jin. Menurut pendapat lain 'Illiyyiin adalah nama sebuah tempat yang terletak di langit yang ketujuh, di bawah Arasy.
answer_id: (Sesungguhnya Alquran itu) yakni wahyu Alquran (adalah benar-benar firman Allah yang diturunkan kepada orang-orang yang bertakwa) kalimat ayat ini berkedudukan menjadi Mubtada (di atas Alquran) menjadi Khabar dari Mubtada (yang mempunyai kedudukan yang tinggi di dalamnya di bawah Arasy) berada di langit yang ketujuh; lafal ayat ini berkedudukan menjadi Khabar dari Mubtada (dan apa) di'athafkan kepada lafal ayat ini, dan lafal ayat ini menjadi Khabar Mubtada (yang di dalamnya ada kitab yang ditulis) Lohmahfuz (dan yang sempurna, tidak ada yang ditambahkan kepadanya kecuali) kalimat-kalimat (malaikat-malaikat yang disucikan) menurut ilmu Allah swt.

question_en: What is the drink of the righteous people of truth and obedience in Paradise?
answer_en: They will be given to drink from a pure wine, sealed well, its last drops having the scent of musk, and in that is an eternal bliss, so let the racers race. This drink is mixed and prepared from a spring in Paradise, known for its high quality, called Tasmim, a spring prepared for the chosen ones to drink from and enjoy.
question_id: Apa minuman dari orang-orang yang adil-benar kebenaran dan ketaatan di surga?
answer_id: (Mereka diberi minum dari khamar murni) atau khamar yang bersih dari kotoran (yang dilak) tempat-tempatnya dan tidak pernah dibuka selain oleh mereka (dan dari khamar murni) yaitu dari khamar (yang dilak) di dalam surga (mereka diberi minuman dengan air yang baik) atau minuman yang tidak pernah kering (dan mereka memperoleh) di dalamnya (tempat minum yang lezat).

question_en: What is the position of disbelieving criminals with the believers in this worldly life, and what is their position with the believers on the Day of Judgment?
answer_en: Those who committed evil deeds used to mock the believers in this world. When they passed by them, they would sneer at them in contempt. And when they returned to their families and relatives, they would mock the believers with them. When these disbelievers saw the companions of Muhammad (peace be upon him), who had accepted guidance, they said, 'These are indeed astray in following Muhammad (peace be upon him).' They said, 'These criminals were not sent as guardians over the companions of Muhammad (peace be upon him).' But on the Day of Judgment, those who believed in Allah and His messenger and acted according to His law will mock the disbelievers, just as the disbelievers mocked them in this world. The believers will sit on magnificent thrones, looking at the honor and bliss that Allah has given them in Paradise, and the greatest of that will be seeing the blessed face of Allah. Will the disbelievers be rewarded with that, after what they used to do in the world of evil and sin? Indeed, those who committed evil deeds were from among those who believed, they used to laugh at them.
question_id: Bagaimanakah keadaan orang-orang kafir dan orang-orang yang kafir itu dalam kehidupan dunia, dan bagaimanakah keadaan orang-orang yang beriman (sama dengan orang mukmin) pada hari kiamat?
answer_id: (Dan orang-orang yang mengerjakan kejahatan adalah orang-orang yang menghinakan orang-orang yang beriman di dunia dengan apa yang telah mereka perbuat) berupa kekafiran dan perbuatan-perbuatan maksiat (kemudian apabila mereka telah diberi petunjuk oleh Rabb mereka) lalu mereka dibinasakan (mereka berkata, "Sesungguhnya mereka telah sesat) disebabkan ucapan mereka itu (sesungguhnya ini) yaitu disebabkan perkataan mereka yang tadi (adalah orang-orang yang memperolok-olokkan) yang dimaksud adalah, mereka memperolok-olokkan Alquran. Mereka diperolok-olokkan orang-orang mukmin di antara mereka.

question_en: When the sky is split open, and it listens to its Lord and does what it is commanded, and when the earth is stretched out and casts forth what it contains and becomes empty, and it listens to its Lord and does what it is commanded, then, O man, you are laboring towards your Lord, a laborious labor, so you will meet Him. Explain the meaning of these verses.
answer_en: If the sky splits and darkens with clouds on the Day of Judgment, and obeys its Lord's command to cleave apart, it is right that it should obey His command. And if the earth is spread out and flattened, and its mountains are leveled on that day, and it casts forth what is within it of the dead, and leaves them, and obeys its Lord's command, it is right that it should obey His command. O human, you are indeed hastening towards Allah, and you are doing deeds, some good and some evil, and then you will meet Allah on the Day of Judgment, and He will reward you for your deeds, either with His grace or justice.
question_id: Apabila langit terbelah, ia akan taat kepada Tuhannya dan menjalankan perintah-Nya. Apabila bumi diratakan, maka hilanglah amal perbuatan mereka.
answer_id: (Jika langit dan bumi itu terbelah) artinya, menjadi belah (maka ikutilah perintah Rabbnya) yakni perintah-Nya yang memerintahkan supaya keluar dari langit (dan jika bumi itu terbelah) terbelah (niscaya gunung-gunung itu akan bergoncang) pada hari kiamat (pada hari kiamat) menjadi Badal dari lafal Idzaa (dan diikuti) di'athafkan kepada lafal Maa (apa yang ada di dalamnya berupa makhluk yang mati) berupa makhluk hidup yang hidup di permukaannya (dan meninggalkan yang mati) meninggalkan semua perkaranya (sedangkan ia taat kepada perintah Rabbnya) yakni, taat kepada perintah-Nya (sedangkan kamu mematuhi perintah-Nya) larangan-Nya. (Sesungguhnya kamu berbuat kebaikan di antara amal saleh) yakni dalam menjalankan apa yang telah diperintahkan Allah (dan kamu menemui Allah pada hari kiamat) yakni di hari kiamat (dan Dia akan memberi balasan kepada kalian) pahala (dengan balasan) yakni di akhirat (atas apa yang telah kalian kerjakan) yaitu sebagaimana yang telah kalian kerjakan di dunia.

question_en: And as for those to whom their record is given behind their backs, they will call out for destruction, and they will burn in a scorching fire. Indeed, he was among his family, joyful. Indeed, he thought that he would never be resurrected. But no, indeed, his Lord was ever watching him. Explain these blessed verses. (The Splitting)
answer_en: As for him who is given his record from behind his back, and he is a disbeliever in Allah, he will bite his hand with regret and say, 'Oh, I wish I had not taken this path!' He will enter the Fire, and he will be burned in it. He was indeed happy and proud in his family in this world, not thinking about the consequences. He thought that he would not return to his Lord alive for the reckoning. But yes, Allah will indeed return him as He began him, and He will judge him for his deeds. Indeed, his Lord was ever watchful over him, knowing his state from the day He created him until the day He will resurrect him.
question_id: (Adapun orang-orang yang diberikan kepadanya kitabnya dari belakang, maka mereka menyerunya, "Sekiranya ia beriman, lalu masuk ke dalam neraka") menurut suatu qiraat lafal Ta'maluna dibaca Ya'maluuna, artinya neraka itu membakarnya. (Sesungguhnya dia menyangka bahwa dia) lafal An di sini adalah bentuk Takhfif dari Anna, yakni bahwasanya Alquran ini (tidak akan dibangkitkan, dan sekali-kali Rabbnya tidak akan melihatnya) artinya melihat-Nya (dan menjelaskan ayat-ayat-Nya) yakni bukti-bukti yang menunjukkan kebenaran risalah-Nya.
answer_id: (Adapun orang-orang yang diberikan kepadanya kitabnya dari belakang, maka dia kafir kepada Allah dan menyombongkan diri di muka bumi tanpa alasan yang benar dan berkata, "Aduhai! Sesungguhnya aku mengira, bahwa dia tidak akan kembali kepada Rabbnya) di dalam ungkapan ini terkandung Iltifat dari Ghaibah kepada Mukhathab; artinya ia tidak akan mendapat ampunan dari Allah (lalu Allah mengembalikannya) masuk (ke dalam api yang menyala-nyala) yakni ke dalam neraka. (Sesungguhnya Rabbnya dia dahulu telah menjaga dirinya dari azab hari kiamat) yakni hari kiamat yang dilakukannya sebelum hari kiamat (sampai dia dibangkitkan-Nya kembali) ke dunia.

question_en: By the dawn and the night when it darkens, and the moon when it wanes, you will certainly ride on (the clouds) one after another. In these verses, what does Allah swear by, and what is the answer to the oath?
answer_en: I swear by Allah, the Most High, by the reddening of the horizon at sunset, by the night and what it gathers of creatures, insects, and other beings, and by the moon when it is full. And the response to this oath is that, O people, you will indeed traverse various stages and diverse states: from a drop of semen to a clot, to a lump of flesh, to the blowing of the spirit, to death, to the resurrection and the Day of Judgment.
question_id: (Demi fajar) yakni fajar yang terbit setiap paginya (dan bulan apabila telah terbenam) telah terbenam sebagaimana yang telah dijelaskan di dalam surah Al-An'am (sesungguhnya kalian) hai penduduk Mekah (benar-benar dapat berjalan pada garis edarnya) pada garis edarnya masing-masing pada garis edarnya masing-masing.
answer_id: (Demi Allah yang mempunyai keagungan) lafal Al-Akhyaar adalah bentuk jamak dari lafal Saajidun, artinya keagungan yang amat besar (yaitu Jibril) lafal Al-Azirah adalah bentuk jamak dari lafal Raajidun adalah bentuk jamak dari lafal Saajidun artinya makhluk. Maksud ayat ini ialah bahwa bintang-bintang itu berada di dalam garis edarnya (dan Aku bersumpah dengan nama Allah Yang Maha Tinggi) dari segala sesuatu yang tidak layak bagi keagungan-Nya (yang demikian itu) yakni keagungan dan kebesaran-Nya (Sesungguhnya kalian benar-benar berjalan) lafal Min di sini adalah bentuk jamak dari lafal wazan lafal wazan fi'il (di malam dan dari segala penjuru.

question_en: But those who disbelieved deny (the truth). And Allah is most knowing of what they conceal. So give them the good news of a painful punishment, except for those who believe and do righteous deeds - for them is a reward imperishable.
answer_en: Indeed, the trait of those who disbelieve is that they deny the truth and oppose the right path. And Allah knows best what they conceal in their hearts of stubbornness, despite knowing that what the Quran has brought is the truth. So, O Messenger, inform them that Allah, the Exalted, has prepared for them a painful torment. But those who believe in Allah and His Messenger and fulfill what Allah has ordained for them, they will have a reward in the Hereafter that is not cut off nor diminished.
question_id: (Dan orang-orang yang kafir) dari kalangan penduduk Mekah; lafal ayat ini berkedudukan menjadi Mubtada, sedangkan Khabarnya, niscaya mereka celaka.
answer_id: (Sesungguhnya orang-orang kafir) seperti Abu Jahal, Abu Lahab dan lain-lainnya (berada dalam kekafiran) yakni kedustaan (dan kesesatan) bagi mereka (dan Allah lebih mengetahui apa yang disembunyikan dalam hati mereka) berupa kekafiran dan kedurhakaan. (Tetapi orang-orang yang beriman kepada Allah dan Rasul-Nya, sedangkan mereka mengetahui) bahwasanya Alquran itu (apa yang telah diturunkan kepada mereka) apa yang diturunkan kepada mereka (maka beritahukanlah kepada mereka) yakni kepada mereka (bahwasanya Allah Yang Maha Perkasa) maka Dia membalas mereka (lagi Maha Penyayang) terhadap orang-orang yang beriman kepada mereka.

question_en: What does Allah swear by in the noble verses: 'By the sky with its great heights, and the Day of Judgment, and the witness and what is witnessed, those who were killed while they were in a state of error.' (Quran 84:1-6) And what is the answer to the oath?
answer_en: I swear by Allah, the Exalted, by the sky with its vast expanses, which the sun and moon traverse, by the Day of Judgment, which Allah has promised to gather all creatures, by the witness and the witnessed, or (by the witness) on the Day of Friday (and by the witnessed) on the Day of Arafah. Answer to the oath: Its meaning is 'Those who have caused a great division in the land have been cursed; to cause the believers to suffer.'
question_id: (Mengapa Allah bersumpah di hadapan mereka) lafal ayat ini berta'alluq kepada lafal yang tidak disebutkan, yaitu azab-Nya (dengan memakai tanda-tanda) yakni hujah-hujah-hujah-hujah-Nya yang jelas (yaitu di langit, di hari kiamat) di hari kiamat (dan disaksikan) oleh malaikat-malaikat yang menyaksikan peristiwa-peristiwa lainnya (orang-orang yang telah mati dalam kesesatan) yakni orang-orang kafir. (Dan bagi mereka) bagi orang-orang yang mendustakan Alquran (ada sumpah) yang menunjukkan akan kekuasaan Allah swt. dan keesaan-Nya (yang mendustakannya) mereka adalah orang-orang yang mendustakan Nabi Muhammad saw.
answer_id: (Demi Allah Yang Maha Tinggi) dari semua makhluk-Nya (Demi langit dan langit yang mempunyai matahari dan bulan) matahari itu beredar pada garis edarnya (pada hari kiamat yang telah dijanjikan) yaitu hari kiamat (bertasbih) menjadi Badal dari lafal Lafal Yaumalnaahu. (Inilah) kebangkitan itu (orang-orang yang mengingkari nikmat Allah) yang telah diberikan-Nya, yaitu azab-Nya (dan orang-orang yang percaya) kepada adanya hari berbangkit.

question_en: What is the story of the People of the Trench?
answer_en: Cursed are those who have broken the earth with great breaking, to afflict the believers, and they have kindled the intense fire, while they sit by it, adhering to it. They are present in what they do to the believers in Allah, throwing them into the fire, if they do not return from their faith. And they did not take them with such severe punishment except that they were believers in Allah, the Mighty, the Praised, who has the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, and He is, exalted be He, over all things a witness, nothing is hidden from Him. Those who burned the believers and the believing women in the fire, to turn them away from the religion of Allah, then they did not repent, for them is the punishment of Hellfire, and for them is a severe burning punishment. Those who believed in Allah and His Messenger and did righteous deeds, for them are gardens beneath which rivers flow, that is the great success.
question_id: (Bagaimanakah) (hingga hari kiamat?) ungkapan ini menggambarkan tentang kengeriannya; ayat yang pertama dan ayat yang kedua merupakan Mubtada dan Khabarnya.
answer_id: (Dilaknatlah orang-orang yang membuat kerusakan di bumi) dengan melakukan kekafiran dan perbuatan-perbuatan maksiat (dengan keimanan yang besar) dengan kekafiran (mereka akan menutupkan api neraka) yang dimaksud adalah api neraka untuk membinasakan diri mereka (maka mereka kekal di dalamnya). (Dan tidak ada yang melindungi mereka) dari api neraka (kecuali orang-orang yang beriman dan orang-orang yang kafir kepada Allah, Yang Maha Perkasa) yang menguasai semua perkara-Nya (lagi Maha Terpuji) yakni Maha Terpuji di dalam perbuatan-perbuatan maksiat.

question_en: Indeed, it is a magnificent Quran, inscribed on a Preserved Tablet. What is the Preserved Tablet?
answer_en: The Preserved Tablet, upon which the Quran is inscribed, is suspended in the air above the seventh heaven, safeguarded from the devils and from any alteration. Its length is as the distance between the heaven and the earth, and its width is as the distance between the East and the West. It is said to be made of white pearl, according to Ibn Abbas, may Allah be pleased with him and his father.
question_id: (Sesungguhnya ini) yakni yang dibacakan kepada kalian (adalah Alquran yang sangat mulia).
answer_id: (Dan pada yang demikian itu) di'athafkan secara Mahall kepada lafal Khalaqnaa (terdapat tanda-tanda) yang menunjukkan akan kekuasaan Allah swt. (dari langit dan bumi) di antara gunung-gunung dan bumi, lafal ayat ini berkedudukan menjadi Hal atau kata keterangan keadaan dari lafal yang sebelumnya dengan mengulangi huruf Jarr-nya atau keterangan keadaan (dan) di'athafkan kepada lafal Maakum (jarak) menjadi Shilah (jarak antara langit dan bumi) hingga sampai ke timur (dan lebarnya) antara langit dan bumi itu sama dengan (antara timur dan barat) yakni antara langit dan bumi itu berada pada tempat yang ketujuh (dan dikatakan) bahwa kedua bentuk jamak dari lafal Rabbmu menurut qiraat yang kedua, bentuk jamak dibuang, tetapi menurut qiraat yang kedua pada ayat ini bermakna Mufrad-duanya (buatlah) menjadi (Allah rida dengan dia dan ayahnya.)

question_en: And by the sky and the Night Visitor, and what do you know what the Night Visitor is? The piercing star. Indeed, every soul will have a guardian over it. So let man observe from what he was created. He was created from gushing water. It comes forth from between the spine and the ribs. Indeed, he is capable over its return. On the day when secrets are revealed. He will have no power or helper. And the sky, it has its return. And the earth, it splits open. Indeed, that is a decisive word. And it is not a trivial matter. Indeed, they are planning a plan. And I am planning a plan. So delay the disbelievers, delay them a little.
answer_en: I swear by Allah, the Exalted, by the sky and the star that pierces the night, and what can you know of the greatness of this star? It is the shining, radiant star. Every soul has a guardian angel who preserves its deeds to be accounted for on the Day of Judgment. So, let the disbeliever in the resurrection consider from what he was created. Let him know that the resurrection of man is not harder than his first creation from a drop of semen, quickly placed in the womb, emerging from between the ribs of a man and the bones of a woman. Indeed, He who created man from this water is certainly able to return him to life after death. On that day, hearts will be tested and laid bare, and the righteous will be distinguished from the wicked. What strength does man have to defend himself, and what protector can he have against Allah's punishment? The sky has rain that repeats, and the earth has cracks through which vegetation grows. The Quran is a clear distinction between truth and falsehood, and it is not a joke. It is not permissible for a creature to swear by other than Allah, otherwise, he has associated partners with Him. Those who reject the Messenger, peace be upon him, and the Quran, plot and scheme to repel the truth and support falsehood. But I plot against them a plot, and I lead them astray, unaware, to show the truth, even if the disbelievers dislike it. O Messenger, do not hasten the punishment for them, but give them respite and watch them a little, and do not hasten it for them. You will see what will befall them of punishment, torment, and doom.
question_id: (Dan di waktu matahari sepenggalah naik, maka hendaklah manusia memperhatikan) dengan perhatian yang dibarengi dengan mempelajarinya (dari apa yang telah diciptakannya) artinya dari mulainya (dan dari air mani) yang dimaksud adalah air mani, atau air mani (Keluarlah ia) maksudnya air mani itu (dari tulang belakang dan tulang rusuk) tulang rusuk yang kanan (sesungguhnya ia adalah seorang yang sangat perkasa) yang dapat melindungi dirinya dari azab Allah swt. dan dari hal-hal lainnya yang menyakitkan. (Sesungguhnya tipu daya mereka tidak dapat menahan diri) mencegah azab Allah (sedikit pun dan tidak pula menahan diri) dari azab Allah (sedikit pun) dari memperbuat yang tidak dikehendaki-Nya, karena itu mereka tidak mau beriman.
answer_id: (Demi Allah yang mempunyai keagungan) atau keagungan (di langit dan bintang) merupakan mashdar dari makna yang tidak disebutkan; lengkapnya menurut ilmu Allah swt. (Maka hendaklah orang yang kafir memikirkan dari apa yang telah diciptakannya itu) yaitu dari apa yang telah diciptakannya itu (dan hendaklah ia mengetahui) yaitu bahwasanya bintang itu berupa bintang itu berupa bintang itu (ialah diagungkan) karena ia memiliki keistimewaan dan keutamaannya. Huruf Min di sini adalah Zaidah (dari apa yang diciptakannya) yang bersinar di langit dan yang di bumi.

question_en: Explain the meaning of the following verses: 'Glory be to Your Lord, the Exalted, Who created and then proportioned, Who determined and then guided, Who brought out the pasture, then made it a decaying brown (stubble), We shall recite to you, so you will not forget, except what Allah wills. Indeed, He knows the manifest and what is hidden. And We will ease you to the easy way. So remind, if the reminder benefits, he who fears will remember, and the most wretched will avoid it, who will enter the great fire, then he will neither die therein nor live. Indeed, he has succeeded who purifies himself and mentions the name of his Lord and performs prayer, but you prefer the life of this world, while the Hereafter is better and more enduring. Indeed, this is in the former scriptures, the scriptures of Abraham and Moses.'
answer_en: Purify your Lord, the Most High's name from partners and defects, purifying Him as befits His Majesty, the One who created the creatures, perfecting their creation, and the One who decreed all decrees, guiding every creation to what suits it, the One who caused the green grass to grow, then made it dry and yellowing. We will recite to you, O Messenger, this Quran in a way that you will not forget, except what Allah wills, due to His wisdom. He knows the apparent and the hidden of speech and action. And We will ease for you, O Messenger, all your affairs, including the facilitation of bearing the burden of the message, and making your religion easy, not difficult. So, advise your people, O Messenger, as We have revealed to you, and guide them to what is best for them. Remind, O Prophet, except those who fear their Lord. And do not tire yourself over those who will not be guided. He who fears his Lord will be reminded, and he who does not fear his Lord will turn away from the reminder. He will enter the great fire, suffering its burn, and will not die therein, nor will he live a life that benefits him. He who purifies himself from evil traits, remembers Allah, singles Him out, calls upon Him, and does what pleases Him, and establishes the prayer at its times, seeking Allah's pleasure and obeying His laws, will succeed. You, O people, prefer the adornment of this worldly life over the eternal bliss of the Hereafter. And the Hereafter, with its everlasting bliss, is better and more enduring than this world. What We have mentioned in this surah is from that which is firmly established in the scriptures that were revealed before the Quran, namely the scriptures of Ibrahim and Musa (peace be upon them).
question_id: (Dan jelaskanlah) hai Muhammad (kepada mereka) yakni kepada orang-orang musyrik (tujuan ayat-ayat Alquran) maksudnya makna-makna dan tanda-tanda (yang mengatakan, "Maha Suci Rabbmu Yang Maha Esa) yakni Zat yang menciptakan kesemuanya itu (lagi Maha Tinggi) sehingga Dia tidak menyegerakan hukuman-Nya bilamana Dia menciptakan kesemuanya itu (lagi Maha Mengetahui) semua makhluk-Nya (lagi Maha Bijaksana) di dalam perbuatan-Nya. Menurut suatu qiraat dibaca dengan takhfif, yaitu anna yang ditakhfifkan, dan dibaca nashabkannya inna karena menjadi tasydid sehingga bacaannya menjadi tasydid.
answer_id: (Maha Suci) ungkapan untuk memahasucikan-Nya (Rabbmu Yang Maha Tinggi) dari segala sifat yang tidak layak bagi kebesaran-Nya (Yang telah membersihkan) yakni menyucikan-Nya (dari apa yang mereka katakan) dari kemusyrikan (dan menyempurnakan) yakni menyucikan (nama-nama-Nya) dari kemusyrikan (nama Yang Maha Tinggi) dari sifat-sifat yang tidak layak bagi kebesaran-Nya (Yang telah menyempurnakan nikmat-Nya) yakni keagungan-Nya (kepada kalian, Rabb kalian, Yang menciptakan apa yang Dia kehendaki) yakni Alquran (dalam Kitab) yakni Alquran (dalam Kitab-Kitab) yakni Alquran (yang tidak ada kemaslahatan) lafal bil-alan adalah bentuk jamak dari kata tunggal rabshab (dan tidak ada kesesatan) artinya sesuatu pun yang membuat keridaan (melainkan bagi kalian) di samping pengetahuan-Nya (dan agar Dia memberi pengajaran kepada siapa yang dikehendaki-Nya) untuk mendapatkan hal tersebut (dan mendapat kerida-Nya) melalui pengetahuan-Nya (hidayah-Nya.

question_en: Have you heard the story of Al-Ghashiya? On that day, faces will be humble, active, and raised, crossing a blazing fire, being given to drink from a flowing spring. They will have no food but bitter thorns that neither nourish nor satisfy hunger. On that day, faces will be at peace, content with their efforts, in a high garden, hearing no idle talk, with a flowing spring, elevated couches, and spread-out carpets. Do they not look at the camels, how they are created? And at the sky, how it is raised? And at the mountains, how they are set up? And at the earth, how it is spread out? So remind, for you are only a reminder. You are not over them a controller. Except for one who turns away and disbelieves. Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment. Indeed, to Us is their return. Then, indeed, upon Us is their account.
answer_en: O Messenger, have you heard of the Day of Judgment that terrifies people? On that day, the faces of the disbelievers will be humiliated by the torment, exhausted by their efforts, struck by a blazing fire, and given to drink from a boiling spring. The inhabitants of Hell will have no food but a bitter, thorny plant that grows on the edge of a slippery surface, which will neither nourish them nor satisfy their hunger. On that day, the faces of the believers will be radiant with joy, for their efforts in this world have been accepted in the Hereafter. They will be in a lofty garden, where they will hear no idle talk, where there is a spring whose waters never cease to flow, and where there are elevated couches and goblets, and carpets spread out. Do the disbelievers not look at the camels and see how they were created? And at the heavens, how they were raised high? And at the mountains, how they were set up? And at the earth, how it was spread out? O Messenger, warn those who turn away from this message, but do not grieve over their disbelief, for you are only a warner. God has no desire to force people to believe. But those who turn away from the reminder and persist in their disbelief will face a severe torment from God. To Us is their return, and to Us they will be held accountable for their deeds.
question_id: (Apakah kamu tidak memperhatikan) maksudnya tidak mengetahui (bahwa sesungguhnya mereka) yakni orang-orang kafir Mekah itu (punya makanan yang tidak memberikan makanan yang baik dan tidak pula rasa lapar. Bagaimanakah mereka dapat di'athafkan kepada orang-orang Mukmin supaya mereka dapat duduk (di atas tempat yang tinggi) tempat menetap yang tinggi (dan mereka tidak takut) kepada tempat-tempat tinggal mereka (sama dengan orang-orang yang duduk) yakni orang-orang kafir (dan tidak pula mabuk) yakni orang-orang kafir (dan tidak pula mabuk) melihat hal-hal yang menyebabkan kekafiran mereka.
answer_id: Hai Rasul, pernahkah kamu mendengar (seruan) orang-orang yang zalim yang mencita-citakan manusia pada hari kiamat, muka orang-orang kafir itu menjadi muram karena mereka ditimpa azab yang amat panas, dan oleh air hujan yang sangat panas, dan penduduk jahannam itu tidak ada (pula) makanan sedikitpun (pula) bagi mereka, melainkan (seperti) tanaman yang tumbuh di tepi jurang, tidak dapat memberi makan dan tidak (pula) menghilangkan kesempitan dari mereka; pada hari itu ada muka orang-orang mukmin mata air yang mengalir dan orang-orang kafir berkata: "Mengapa kamu tidak melihat tempat ini, melainkan kalau sekiranya kamu melihat neraka, niscaya kamu dapat membuat suatu umat yang kafir?"

question_en: By what does Allah, the Exalted, swear in the noble verses, and what is the answer to the oath? The dawn, the ten nights, the even and the odd, the night when it becomes still - is there in this an oath for one who is mindful? Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with 'Ad, Iram - who had lofty pillars, the like of which has not been created in the land, and Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley, and Pharaoh, who had lofty palaces, those who transgressed in the land and multiplied corruption therein? So, your Lord poured upon them a rain of abuse. Indeed, your Lord is ever watchful.
answer_en: God swears by the dawn, the ten nights of Dhul-Hijjah, by every pair and every individual, and by the night when it spreads out its darkness. Is there not in these oaths a sufficient reminder for one with understanding? And the response: Have you not seen, O Messenger, how your Lord dealt with the people of Ad, a powerful nation with lofty buildings, and with the people of Thamud, who carved out mountains for homes, and with Pharaoh, king of Egypt, who had mighty armies and strengthened his rule? These were the oppressors who committed injustice in the land, causing corruption. So, your Lord poured upon them a severe torment. Indeed, your Lord, O Messenger, is watchful over those who disobey Him, delaying for a while, then seizing them with a powerful grasp.
question_id: (Apakah kamu tidak memperhatikan) artinya tidak mengetahui hai Muhammad (bagaimana Rabbmu berbuat terhadap negeri-negeri yang lalim) yakni orang-orang kafir (di muka bumi?) yaitu negeri Syam dan negeri-negeri lainnya (kepada orang-orang yang lalim) yaitu orang-orang kafir (dimuka bumi?) yaitu orang-orang yang mendustakan Nabi saw. (Maka apakah kamu tidak memperhatikan) memperhatikan (bagaimana Rabbmu berbuat kerusakan di muka bumi?) yaitu gemar melakukan perbuatan-perbuatan dosa lainnya.
answer_id: (Demikianlah) sebagaimana mereka berpaling daripada iman (Rabbmu menimpakan kepada mereka kaum Ad) yaitu kaum Nabi Hud (sebuah bangunan yang tinggi) lafal ayat ini menjadi Badal dari lafal Al-'Aalamiina (dan Tsamud) nama sebuah lembah yang terletak di negeri Yaman (yang telah membuat banyak kerusakan di muka bumi) dengan kekafiran dan perbuatan-perbuatan maksiat (yaitu orang-orang yang telah menghalang-halangi) orang-orang kafir (dari jalan Allah) dari agama-Nya. (Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang akan dibinasakan) yaitu mereka akan diazab (Rabbmu, Rabbmu, sesungguhnya Dia Maha Pengampun) atas dosa-dosa mereka (lagi Maha Penyayang) terhadap mereka.

question_en: What does a disbelieving person say to their Lord, the Exalted and Glorious, when they are honored by Him, and what do they say when they are humiliated? And is this saying correct?
answer_en: But when Allah blesses a person with wealth and makes their life comfortable, they think it is because of their own worth and say, 'My Lord has honored me.' But when He tests them by reducing their wealth, they think it is because of their disgrace and say, 'My Lord has humiliated me.' No, it is not wealth that brings honor, nor poverty that brings disgrace. It is only piety that brings honor, and it is only sin that brings disgrace. And the people of Makkah do not understand this. They do not honor the orphan, nor do they encourage each other to feed the poor, and they consume the rights of others in inheritance greedily, and they love wealth excessively.
question_id: (Dan tidak ada) dapat dibaca Lam Takun atau Lam Yakun (orang yang kafir) yakni orang-orang kafir; ungkapan ini dimaksud sebagai pernyataan terhadap keesaan Allah swt. (seraya berkata kepada Rabb mereka, "Maha Suci Allah dan Maha Tinggi Dia) dari sifat-sifat yang tidak layak bagi-Nya (dan Maha Tinggi daripada apa yang mereka katakan) dari sifat-sifat yang tidak layak bagi kebesaran-Nya, dan dari hal-hal yang tidak layak bagi kebesaran-Nya. (Apakah) dapat dibaca Tahqiq dan Tas-hil (jika mereka adalah orang-orang yang hina?") yakni orang-orang yang terhina.
answer_id: (Dan apabila Allah memberikan kepada seseorang) yakni Allah swt. (harta mereka) berupa zakat dan lain-lainnya (dan kekayaan mereka, mereka berkata, "Rabbku telah menghinakan aku) Maha Tinggi Allah dari segala sifat yang tidak layak bagi kebesaran-Nya (dan Dia telah mewajibkan kepada mereka) yakni kepada orang-orang yang takut kepada-Nya (harta benda mereka) baik berupa biji-bijian maupun lain-lainnya (mereka tidak memuliakan anak-anak yatim) artinya mereka tidak mengagungkannya (dan tidak menganjurkan) tidak menganjurkan (orang-orang miskin dan orang-orang miskin, hanya kepada orang-orang yang mencintai harta dan anak-anak yang banyak).

question_en: No, when the earth is shaken with a violent shaking, and your Lord comes with the angels in rows, on that day, Hell will be brought near. On that day, man will remember what he has done, and how will the remembrance benefit him? How does Hell come on the Day of Judgment, and what is its state?
answer_en: On that day, Hellfire will be brought, led by seventy thousand angels, each angel holding seventy thousand reins, with a mighty roar and a fierce glare. On that day, the disbelieving soul will remember what it neglected, but its remembrance will not benefit it.
question_id: (Ingatlah) pada hari (ketika) bumi diguncangkan dengan guncangannya; maka Tuhanmu beserta para malaikat bershaf-shaf dengan berbaris-baris. Dan pada hari (kiamat) itu diperlihatkan kepadanya neraka Jahannam; dan pada hari itu ingatlah manusia, akan tetapi tidak berguna lagi mengingat itu baginya, akan tetapi (ingatlah) hari kiamat.
answer_id: (Pada hari itu didatangkan neraka Jahanam) dinashabkan oleh lafal Al-Qaari'ah yang dijelaskan oleh lafal Al-Qaari'ah yang tidak disebutkan (pada hari itu berjumlah tujuh puluh ribu malaikat) menjadi Maf'ul Lah (dan malaikat-malaikat) menjadi Maf'ul Lah (menyeru dengan membawa tujuh puluh ribu malaikat) lafal Wailun adalah Mashdar yang dinashabkan oleh Fi'ilnya yang diperkirakan keberadaannya, dan pada ayat ini diperkirakan keberadaannya (dan pada hari itu malaikat-malaikat) yakni para malaikat itu membawa 70 ribu malaikat, demikian pula firman-Nya, ("Malaikat itu tidak berguna) maksudnya, tidak dapat menyelamatkan diri dari api itu (bagi orang-orang kafir) yakni, karena mereka tidak mau beriman.

question_en: What is said to the reassured soul at the time of its death?
answer_en: It is said to her: 'O tranquil soul, return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing, and enter among My [righteous] servants, and enter My Paradise.'
question_id: Apa yang dikatakan kepada jiwa yang tenang pada saat kematiannya?
answer_id: Kembalilah kepada Tuhanmu dengan hati yang puas lagi diridhai-Nya; masuklah ke dalam surga-Ku bersama hamba-hamba-Ku yang saleh.

question_en: What does Allah swear by in the noble verses, and what is the answer to the oath?
answer_en: I swear by Allah: by this sacred city, which is Mecca, and you, O Prophet, residing in this sacred city, and I swear by the father of mankind, Adam, and all his descendants. Answer to the oath: Indeed, we have created man in hardship and toil from the toil of the world.
question_id: Apakah (patut Al Quran) untuk Allah (menciptakan) ayat-ayat yang mulia, dan apakah sumpah itu?
answer_id: (Demi Allah, sesungguhnya aku bersumpah dengan kota ini) yakni Mekah (yang namanya adalah kota Mekah) kota Mekah (yang penduduknya suci) orang-orang yang hidup di dalamnya pasti akan mati (dan dengan nama Allah bahwa sesungguhnya Kami telah menciptakan manusia) semuanya (dalam keadaan susah) yaitu dengan susah payah (dan dalam keadaan payah) secara sembunyi-sembunyi dan terang-terangan.

question_en: Do you think that no one has power over him? He says, 'I have destroyed wealth lavishly. Do you think that no one saw him? Have We not given him two eyes, a tongue, and two lips? And guided him to the two clear paths? Then he did not attempt the steep path. And what do you know about the steep path? It is the freeing of a neck or feeding on a day of severe hunger to an orphan related to you or a poor person in misery. Then he was of those who believed and advised each other to patience and advised each other to mercy. Those are the companions of the right hand. And those who disbelieved in Our verses, they are the companions of the left hand. Upon them is a fire closed in.
answer_en: Man thinks he is strong, the father of the most powerful, the son of Qudaida, that no one can overcome him, but Allah can. He says, 'I have spent so much on the enmity of Muhammad, peace be upon him, thinking that no one has seen what I have spent, not knowing its value. But Allah knows its value, and it is not something that increases in value or makes up for his evil deeds. Have we not made for him eyes, a tongue, and lips that he may speak, and shown him the paths of good and evil? Then why does he not strive to avoid the hardship of the Hereafter by spending his wealth, so that he may be safe? And what is better for you to know: what is the hardship of the Hereafter, and what relieves it? It is the freeing of a believing slave from the fetters of slavery, or feeding a relative in need on a day of severe famine, or giving to a poor person who has nothing. Then, along with these acts of kindness, they also performed other good deeds, and advised each other to be patient in obeying Allah and avoiding His disobedience, and showed mercy to the creation. Those who did these deeds are the companions of the right hand, who will be taken on the Day of Resurrection to Paradise on the right. But those who rejected the Quran will be taken on the Day of Resurrection to Hell on the left. Their reward is Hell, which is prepared for them, closed upon them.
question_id: (Apakah kamu mengira bahwa tidak seorang pun yang Kami berikan kepadanya dua buah mata, lidah dan dua bibir yang terbuka) dua kali sebagaimana yang telah disebutkan tadi (dan ia tidak menunjukkan jalan) ayat ini diturunkan berkenaan dengan orang yang membangga-banggakan dirinya dengan dirinya (maka ia berkata, "Aku telah menghabiskan) aku menghabiskan (harta benda yang banyak) yang banyak telah disebutkan tadi; jumlah ini merupakan jumlah I'tiradh atau kalimat sisipan.
answer_id: (Dia menduga) karena kebodohannya (bahwa tak ada seorang pun yang dapat menahannya) dari azab Allah sewaktu ia masih kecil (melainkan Allah berkata-Nya, "Sesungguhnya aku telah menghabiskan sebagian daripadanya untuk memusuhi Muhammad) yakni berbicara dengan dia sebagaimana yang disitir oleh ayat lain, yaitu firman-Nya, "Sesungguhnya aku ini hanyalah seorang pemberi peringatan." (Q.S. Al-Qashash, 38) Jarak antara kedua perkataan yang telah dikatakannya itu empat puluh tahun.

question_en: What does Allah swear by in the noble verses, and what is the answer to the oath?
answer_en: I swear by Allah, by the sun and its radiance, by the moon when it follows the sun, by the day when it reveals the darkness and by the night when it covers the earth in darkness, by the sky and its firm structure, by the earth and its expanse, by all souls and their perfect creation for the fulfillment of their purpose, for He has shown them the path of evil and the path of good. Answer to the oath: He who purifies and cultivates it with good has indeed succeeded, and he who conceals himself in sins has indeed failed.
question_id: Apakah (patut Al Quran) untuk Allah (menciptakan) ayat-ayat yang mulia, dan apakah sumpah itu?
answer_id: Demi matahari dan cahayanya di waktu matahari bersinar, dan matahari itu (demi Allah) ketika mengiringi matahari itu menyinari matahari dan siang apabila Allah menampakkan kepada mereka kegelapan dan kegelapan malam, dan menutupkan malam kepada mereka, dengan cahayanya, dan menundukkan (pula) langit dan bumi, dan dengan cahayanya, dan dengan cahayanya (terdapat) bagi mereka, karena sesungguhnya Allah telah menyempurnakan kepada mereka jalan yang lurus dan Dia telah menyempurnakan nikmat-nikmat-Nya, dan telah menyempurnakan nikmat-Nya bagi orang-orang yang bertakwa.

question_en: What did Prophet Salih (peace be upon him) say to his people about the she-camel, and what did they do?
answer_en: The Messenger of Allah, peace be upon him, said to them: 'Beware of mistreating the she-camel, for she is a sign that Allah has sent to you, indicating the truth of your prophet. Also, beware of hindering her from drinking, for she has a share of water on the Day of Resurrection, and so do you have a specified share. This was hard for them to bear, so they denied what he had warned them about, and the most wicked among them, whose name was Qudar, rushed to slaughter the she-camel with their consent. Therefore, their Lord's punishment overtook them because of their sin, and He made it an equal retribution upon them, so none was left among them. And Allah, exalted is His power, does not fear the consequences of what He sends down of severe punishment. The people of Thamud rejected the command of their Lord in their arrogance. When their most wicked one came to them, he said, 'O people of Thamud, this is the she-camel of Allah and her water supply.' But they denied him and hamstrung her. So, their Lord brought His punishment upon them for their sin and made them equal in destruction, and they did not fear the consequence of it. The sun.
question_id: (Apakah) patut (dikatakan) azab (oleh nabi) yakni Nabi Saleh (kepada kaumnya tentang unta betina itu) yaitu tentang unta betina itu (dan) demikian pula (apa yang mereka perbuat terhadap diri mereka sendiri?) berupa kekafiran dan kedustaan.
answer_id: (Telah diwahyukan kepadamu, Muhammad, bahwasanya) dhamir di sini adalah dhamir sya'n (jika kamu mengetahui ada tanda-tanda kekuasaan Allah) yakni mukjizat-mukjizat-Nya (padahal Allah menimpakan tanda-tanda kebesaran-Nya kepada kamu) hai Muhammad (maka berhati-hatilah kamu) jangan sampai kamu melanggarnya. (Maka Allah menimpakan azab kepada mereka) yakni azab-Nya (disebabkan kelaliman mereka) yaitu disebabkan kemusyrikan dan kemusyrikan mereka (dan karena kekufuran mereka) karena mereka mendustakan rasul-rasul-Nya.

question_en: And the night when it covers (1) and the day when it appears (2) and what He created of males and females (3) Indeed, your efforts are varied (4). What does Allah swear by in these blessed verses, and what is the answer to the oath?
answer_en: By Allah, Who has made the night to cover with darkness, and the day to appear bright, and has created you from male and female, your works vary: some for this world, and some for the Hereafter.
question_id: (Dan) ingatlah (malam yang menutupi) semua manusia (dan siang hari ketika Allah menampakkan) mempermaklumkan (kepada manusia dan apa yang diciptakan-Nya) artinya Allahlah yang menciptakan mereka dengan ilmu-Nya (Maha Suci Allah dari apa yang mereka persekutukan) bersama-Nya dengan ibadah mereka sehingga mereka tidak dapat meloloskan diri dari azab-Nya. Huruf Min di sini adalah Zaidah (Sesungguhnya kalian) hai orang-orang yang diajak berbicara.
answer_id: Demi Allah yang menjadikan malam untuk menutupi kegelapan, dan menjadikan siang terang benderang bagi kamu, dan Dia menciptakan kamu dari pria dan wanita, dan sebahagian kamu mempersekutukan (yang lain) dengan (mengerjakan) pekerjaan-pekerjaanmu di dunia dan (pula) di akhirat.

question_en: Who will Allah guide to the causes of goodness and righteousness, and who will He guide to the causes of misfortune?
answer_en: As for those who spend their wealth in the way of Allah and then follow not up what they have spent with reminders of their generosity or with injury, for them their reward is with their Lord. And no fear shall be on them, nor shall they grieve. But those who spend their wealth to show off, and do not believe in Allah and the Last Day, their spending is comparable to a freezing wind that strikes the harvest of others who have planted for the poor. No good is it for them. Indeed, their likeness is like that of one who kindled a fire, and when it illuminated all around him, Allah took away their light and left them in darkness, unable to see.
question_id: Siapakah yang dapat menunjuki (manusia) kepada kebajikan dan kebaikan, dan siapa yang mau memberi petunjuk kepada jalan kebaikan?
answer_id: Orang-orang yang menafkahkan hartanya di jalan Allah, kemudian mereka tidak mengiringi apa yang dinafkahkannya itu dengan menyebut-nyebut pemberiannya dan dengan tidak menyakiti (perasaan si penerima), mereka memperoleh pahala di sisi Tuhan mereka. Tidak ada kekhawatiran terhadap mereka dan tidak (pula) mereka bersedih hati.

question_en: Explain these noble verses: 'I warn you of a blazing Fire, to which none shall be brought except the most wretched, who denied and turned away, and will avoid it the most righteous, who spends his wealth to purify himself, and for none is there any reward except the seeking of the Face of his Lord, the Most High. And he shall be pleased.' (The Night)
answer_en: I warn you, O people, and I make you fear a fire that blazes, and it is the fire of Hell. None shall enter it except one who is severely afflicted, who has denied the Prophet Muhammad, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, and has turned away from faith in Allah and His Messenger. But one who is severe in piety, who spends his wealth seeking the best of good by spending it for Allah's sake, not to show off or for reputation, will be far removed from it, and he will be pure with Allah. This was revealed about Abu Bakr, may Allah be pleased with him, when he bought and freed Bilal, the one who was tortured for his faith, and the disbelievers said he only did that to gain favor with him. And that spending is not a reward for a kindness done to him, for Allah will give him in Paradise what will please him.
question_id: (Dan bacakanlah) hai Muhammad (kepada mereka) yakni orang-orang kafir Mekah (ayat-ayat Alkitab) yakni Alquran (yang menjelaskan, "Sesungguhnya Aku memperingatkan kepada kalian) Aku memperingatkan kalian (tentang api neraka) yang apinya menyala-nyala (tiada lain) (orang-orang yang mendustakan) yang dimaksud adalah orang-orang kafir (mendustakan) Alquran (dan orang-orang yang beramal saleh) yakni orang-orang yang ikhlas di dalam kekafirannya (mereka nafkahkan) di dunia (harta bendanya untuk membersihkannya) untuk membersihkannya (dan sekali-kali tidak ada pahala selain dari) selain dari pahala (Rabbnya Yang Maha Tinggi) yakni Allah swt.
answer_id: (Hai manusia!) yakni penduduk Mekah (sesungguhnya aku memperingatkan kalian akan api neraka yang menyala-nyala) untuk membakar kalian (tidaklah akan masuk) ke dalamnya (kecuali orang yang ditimpa musibah) yaitu api yang sangat besar nyalanya (yang akan menimpanya selain orang yang kafir) seperti Abu Sofyan dan kawan-kawannya (yang telah mendustakan) Nabi Muhammad saw. (dan Allah akan mengeluarkannya) dapat dibaca Yu'adzdzdzibhu atau Nu'adzdzibhu, kalau dibaca Nu'adzdzibhu artinya, ia diberi rahmat oleh Allah (dan akan menjauhkannya dari iman kepada Allah dan Rasul-Nya) yakni dari rahmat-Nya (Dan barang siapa yang dikehendaki Allah, niscaya dimasukkan-Nya ke dalam surga yang mulia).

question_en: And the morning hours! And the night when it is still! What has your Lord not left you, nor has He neglected you. And the Hereafter is better for you than the first. And your Lord will surely give you, so you will be pleased. Did He not find you an orphan and He gave you shelter? And He found you lost and He guided you. And He found you in need and He made you rich. As for the orphan, do not oppress him. And as for the seeker, do not drive him away. And as for the bounty of your Lord, then speak about it. Interpret the meanings of these verses.
answer_en: I swear by the time of daybreak, and by the night when it darkens, and by Him who created both, and by [all] that exists - [He is] indeed, of a great [matter]! And by the [angels] who arrange [each] matter [according to His will], [He is] indeed, of a great [matter]! Has not your Lord found you as an orphan and given you shelter? And He found you lost and guided [you]; and He found you poor and made [you] rich. So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him]. And as for the seeker [of knowledge], do not repel [him]. And as for the favor of your Lord, then proclaim [it].
question_id: Dan Tuhanmu lebih baik dari pada yang pertama. Dan Dia mendapatimu sebagai seorang yatim, padahal Dia mendapatimu sebagai seorang yang kekurangan, dan Dia mendapatimu dalam keadaan kaya, dan bukan pula seorang anak yatim.
answer_id: (Demi fajar) yakni fajar yang terbit setiap hari (dan demi malam) maksudnya demi bintang yang terang-benderang dan terang-benderang siang hari (ketika gelap) menjadi gelap (gelap-gulita) yakni gelapnya malam hari (dan dengan apa yang diciptakan-Nya) berupa margasatwa, gunung-gunung, lautan, sungai-sungai dan sungai-sungai (dan apa yang diciptakan-Nya) seperti buah-buahan dan buah-buahan (oleh Rabbmu berupa anak-anak yatim) anak-anak (dan Dia mendapatimu) di'athafkan kepada lafal yubdiyyaqu; artinya Tuhanmu (dengan cahaya) hati yang tebal (Dia mendapatimu) lafal bilhaqqi berta'alluq kepada lafal Khalaqa (lalu Dia mendapatimu sebagai orang-orang miskin) yakni orang-orang yang kaya (dan Dia tidak berlaku zalim) di dalam menghadapi orang-orang yang jahil (dengan ilmu-Nya, dan Dia mendapatimu sebagai orang-orang yang bertakwa).

question_en: Did We not expand your breast [chest], relieve you of your burden, which had weighed heavily on your back, raised your fame, and indeed, with hardship comes ease? So, when you have finished [your task], strive [for more], and to your Lord turn [in gratitude].
answer_en: Did we not expand, O Prophet, your breast for the remembrance of the religion, the call to Allah, and the adornment of good manners? And did we not lift from you a burden that weighed heavily upon you? And did we not raise your remembrance by mentioning you in the adhan, iqamah, testimony, khutbah, and other places, and did we not place you, by the blessings we bestowed upon you, in a high and lofty position? So, with hardship comes ease. The Prophet (peace be upon him) endured hardship from the disbelievers, then ease came to him through his victory over them. So, when you have finished with the affairs of this world, strive in worship, and to your Lord alone turn in repentance and hope.
question_id: Dan apakah Kami tidak memanjangkan umurmu dalam masa yang cukup untuk berfikir, dan Kami telah melapangkan (menimbulkan) beban-beban yang berat atasmu, dan Kami telah melapangkan (rezekimu) dan menimpakan atas dirimu sendiri kemudharatan. Maka apabila kamu telah menyelesaikan (apa yang telah kamu kerjakan), kerjakanlah (amal-amal yang saleh) dan hanya kepada Tuhanmulah kamu kembali.
answer_id: Dan bukankah Kami telah melapangkan untukmu dadamu di waktu kamu menyebut nama Allah di Masjidil Haram, memberi kesaksian, (yaitu) diantara orang-orang mukmin, dan (ingatlah pula) di tempat-tempat yang baik, dan Kami tidak memikulkan beban-beban kepadamu, melainkan dengan (menimbulkan) beban-beban (yang berat) yang berat atasmu, dan Kami tidak menjadikan kamu dalam keadaan aman, karena itu datanglah ketenangan bagi orang-orang kafir, kemudian kamu dapat mengalahkan mereka dari padanya. Maka apabila kamu telah menyelesaikan urusan (yang demikian itu), bermusyawarahlah dan kamu telah berada dalam tempat yang tinggi (pula), dan kamu telah berada dalam tempat yang terpuji.

question_en: And [by] the fig and the olive, [by] the Mount Sinai, [by] this secure city - indeed We created man in the best of forms; then We return him to the lowest of the low, except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward unceasing. What, then, could make you deny the religion, and you are not, by your Lord, in awe of it? Is not Allah, of all [those who] judge, the most just?
answer_en: I swear by the date palm and the olive, both of which are famous fruits, and I swear by Mount Sinai on which Allah spoke to Moses, and I swear by this secure city, which is free from all fear, and that is Makkah, the place of descent of Islam. Indeed, we have created man in the best of forms, then we returned him to the lowest of the low, as a sign of the decline and weakness, so the deeds of the believer decrease from the time of his youth, and he will have his reward, or (then we returned him to the fire if he does not obey Allah and follow the messengers). But those who believe and do righteous deeds, for them is a great reward, neither diminished nor decreased. (And in the hadith: 'When a believer reaches old age and is unable to work, it is written for him the reward of what he used to do.') So, what makes you -O human- deny the resurrection and reckoning, despite the clear signs of Allah's power? Is not Allah, who has made this day for the judgment between people, the most just of all judges in all that He has created? Yes, indeed. So, will the creation be left without being commanded or forbidden, without being rewarded or punished? That is not correct and will not happen.
question_id: (Dan) ingatlah (ketika Kami menjadikan dia) yakni Nabi Nuh (orang-orang yang paling rendah di antara mereka) yaitu orang-orang yang paling rendah di antara mereka (dan orang-orang yang beramal saleh) yaitu orang-orang yang mempunyai derajat yang tinggi di akhirat, seperti Abdullah bin Salam dan teman-temannya (sebagai pahala) yaitu surga (yang besar) yaitu mendapat surga. (Maka mengapa kamu mengingkarinya) Istifham atau kata tanya di sini bermakna sanggahan (padahal kamu tidak takut kepada Rabbmu) tidak takut kepada-Nya karena takut kepada-Nya.
answer_id: (Aku bersumpah) huruf Laa di sini adalah huruf Zaidah (dengan nama pohon kurma) yakni pohon kurma yang pohon kurma dan zaitun yang pohonnya tumbuh-tumbuhannya tumbuh-tumbuhan dan pohon kurma; lafal ayat ini berkedudukan menjadi Hal atau kata keterangan keadaan dari dhamir yang terkandung di dalam lafal yang sebelumnya (dan pohon kurma) yakni pohon kurma (yang mempunyai pohon kurma dan zaitun yang mempunyai pohon kurma yang tumbuh) tumbuh-tumbuhannya tumbuh-tumbuhan dan buah-buahan lainnya (dan sungguh Kami telah menjadikan) keduanya merupakan bentuk jamak dari lafal Laa Tun (manusia dan Kami telah mengembalikannya kepada yang paling sedikit kemudian dia tidak mengingkari nikmat-nikmat Kami) yaitu surga (akan tetapi orang-orang yang telah beriman dan yang tidak mau mengerjakan amal saleh) diathafkan kepada lafal Lafal Laatin dapat pula dibaca Laakinaa; artinya, yaitu orang yang tidak beriman dan orang-orang yang kafir.

question_en: Explain the meaning of the following verses: 'Read in the name of your Lord who created (1), who created man from a clinging substance (2). Read, and your Lord is the Most Honorable (3), who taught by the pen (4), taught man what he did not know (5). No, indeed, man transgresses (6), when he thinks he is self-sufficient (7). Indeed, to your Lord is the return (8). Have you seen the one who prevents (9) a servant when he prays (10)? Have you seen if he was on the right guidance (11) or commanded righteousness (12)? Have you seen if he denied and turned away (13)? Did he not know that Allah sees (14)? No, if he does not stop, we will drag him by the forelock (15), a lying, erring forelock (16). So let him call his associates (17). We will call the keepers of Hell (18). No, do not obey him, and prostrate and draw near (19).'
answer_en: Read, O Prophet, what has been revealed to you of the Quran, beginning with the name of your Lord, the Unique Creator, who created every human being from a clinging blood clot. Read, O Prophet, what has been revealed to you, for your Lord is indeed Most Generous, Most Bountiful, who taught humanity writing with the pen, taught them what they did not know, and brought them out of darkness into light. Indeed, man transgresses the limits of Allah when wealth corrupts him. Let every tyrant know that the ultimate destination is to Allah, and He will reward each person according to their deeds. Have you seen the audacity of that man (he is Abu Jahl) who forbids one of our slaves (he is Muhammad, may Allah bless him) from praying to his Lord? Have you seen if he forbids from guidance, how can he forbid? Or if he commands others to piety, where is his guidance? Have you seen if he denies this forbidding and turns away, did he not know that Allah sees all that he does? The matter is not as Abu Jahl claims. If he does not turn from his obstinacy and arrogance, we will certainly seize him by the forelock and throw him into the fire. His forehead is a lying forehead in its speech and wrong in its actions. Let this tyrant bring his companions from his tribe, for we will call upon the angels of punishment. The matter is not as Abu Jahl thinks. You, O Prophet, will not be harmed by him, so do not obey him in what he has invited you to leave the prayer, and prostrate to your Lord and draw near to Him through obedience.
question_id: (Bacalah) maksudnya mulailah membaca dan memulainya (dengan menyebut nama Rabbmu Yang menciptakan) semua makhluk (Kafir Yang Maha Pemurah) yang dimaksud adalah Allah swt. (Sesungguhnya dia telah datang kepada Rabbmu, membawa kebenaran) yang dimaksud adalah Alquran (dan membenarkan apa yang ada padanya) maksudnya yang berupa kitab Taurat (padahal ia kafir) karena ia mengingkari adanya kitab Taurat itu. (Maka apakah kamu tidak melihat orang yang menghalang-halangi) yakni orang yang berpaling (dari kebenaran) dari Alquran (dan jika ia berpaling) dari keimanan (niscaya Kami akan menariknya kesesatannya kepada sebagian yang lain) dari petunjuk yang hak (niscaya dia tidak akan menyesatkan) huruf min di sini adalah zaidah (dan tidak akan menyesatkan) orang yang mukmin; makna ini diungkapkan oleh firman Allah swt.
answer_id: (Bacalah) maksudnya mulailah membaca dan memulainya (dengan menyebut nama Rabbmu yang telah menciptakan) semua makhluk (dari segumpal darah, maka bacalah apa yang telah diwahyukan kepadamu dan apa yang diwahyukan kepadamu dari Alquran) dari lafal ayat ini menjadi badal dari lafal alladziina (yaitu bahwasanya) huruf an di sini adalah bentuk takhfif daripada lafal anna (Tuhan Yang Maha Pemurah telah mengajarkan kepada manusia ilmu-Nya tentang apa yang tidak mereka ketahui) yakni apa-apa yang di antara ilmu-Nya (dan Dia telah mewajibkan kepada kalian) Allah telah memerintahkan kepada kalian supaya menyembah kepada-Nya (apa yang tidak diketahui-Nya) yakni azab-Nya (dalam Kitab-Nya) yakni Alquran (dan jika kalian berpaling) dari kekafiran (niscaya Dia akan menyesatkan kalian) yakni Allah (dan akan memberi petunjuk kepada siapa yang dikehendaki-Nya) untuk mendapat petunjuk.

question_en: What do you know about the Night of Decree? Explain the meanings of these verses.
answer_en: We sent down the Quran on the Night of Honor and Glory, which is one of the nights of the month of Ramadan. And how do you know, O Prophet, what the Night of Power and Honor is? The Night of Power is a blessed night, and its value is better than that of a thousand months, with no night in it being equal to the Night of Power. Many angels and Gabriel, peace be upon him, descend therein, by the permission of their Lord, with every matter decreed in that year. It is peace throughout that night, until the break of dawn, and no evil befalls therein.
question_id: Dan tahukah kamu apakah malam kemuliaan dan kehormatan itu?
answer_id: Malam kemuliaan dan kehormatan itu adalah malam kemuliaan dan kehormatan. Malam kemuliaan dan kehormatan itu lebih baik dari seribu bulan karena malam itu tidak sama dengan malam kemuliaan dan kehormatan.

question_en: The verses have been revealed. Interpret them.
answer_en: Those who disbelieved among the Jews, Christians, and pagans did not leave their disbelief until the sign they were promised in the previous books came to them. That sign is the Messenger of Allah, Muhammad (peace be upon him), reciting the Quran on pure pages. On those pages are true news and fair decrees, guiding to the truth and the straight path. Those who received the scriptures from the Jews and Christians did not differ in considering Muhammad (peace be upon him) as a true messenger due to his description in their books, except after it became clear to them that he was the prophet promised in the Torah and the Gospel. Then they agreed on the truth of his prophethood, but when he was sent, they denied him and became divided. They were commanded in all previous religions to worship Allah alone, seeking His face in their worship, turning away from associating partners with Him, establishing prayer, and giving zakat. That is the religion of uprightness, and that is Islam. Those who disbelieved among the Jews, Christians, and pagans will have their punishment in the fire of Hell, wherein they will abide eternally. They are the worst of creation. Those who believed in Allah, followed His messenger, and did righteous deeds, they are the best of creation. Their reward with their Lord on the Day of Resurrection is gardens of perpetual residence, beneath which rivers flow. They will abide therein eternally. Allah is pleased with them and accepts their righteous deeds, and they are pleased with what He has prepared for them from various bounties. That is the good reward for those who fear Allah and avoid His disobedience.
question_id: Al-Qur'ân telah diwahyukan kepadamu, Muhammad, supaya dengan demikian dapat menjadi petunjuk, pelajaran dan peringatan bagi orang-orang yang zalim.
answer_id: (Sesungguhnya telah datang kepada mereka keterangan-keterangan) yakni mukjizat-mukjizat (dari Tuhan mereka, yaitu Muhammad) Alquran (yang membenarkan kitab-kitab mereka) menjadi Khabar dari Mubtada (padahal mereka tidak beriman kepadanya.

question_en: When the earth is shaken with its (final) shaking, and the earth throws out its burdens, and man says, 'What is the matter with it?' - on that Day, it will declare its news, because your Lord has inspired it. On that Day, people will come out in groups to be shown their deeds. So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it, and whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.
answer_en: If the earth trembles violently and brings forth what is within it of the dead and treasures, and mankind asks in terror: 'What has happened to it?' On the Day of Judgment, the earth will inform of what was done upon it, good or evil, and that Allah, the Exalted, has commanded it to inform. On that day, people will return to the reckoning in various groups; so that Allah may show them what they have done of sins and good deeds, and reward them accordingly. Whoever does the weight of a small ant of good will see its reward in the Hereafter, and whoever does the weight of a small ant of evil will see its punishment in the Hereafter.
question_id: (Dan apabila bumi diguncangkan) yaitu mengalami gempa di saat hari kiamat tiba (dengan guncangannya) yang amat dahsyat sesuai dengan bentuknya yang besar (Dan bumi itu mengeluarkan isinya) yakni semua makhluk semuanya (dan berkata, "Apakah yang terjadi pada hari ini?") yang dimaksud adalah hari kiamat (maka barang siapa yang mengerjakan kebaikan) yakni ketaatan (niscaya dia akan melihatnya) tentu saja ia akan melihat pahalanya (dan barang siapa yang berbuat kebaikan maka sesungguhnya ia akan melihatnya) tentu saja ia akan melihat pahalanya (dan barang siapa yang berbuat kejahatan sebesar dzarrah) semut yang paling kecil (kecelakaan yang besar saja.) dzarrah hanya sebesar biji atom saja.
answer_id: (Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang berbuat kebaikan) lafal Al-Abraar bentuk jamak dari lafal Barrun atau Baarrun, artinya orang-orang yang mengerjakan kebaikan (dan yang buruk) berupa kemusyrikan dan lain-lainnya (mereka itu bertakwa) tidak berbuat maksiat. (Dan barang siapa yang mengerjakan kebaikan) yakni ketaatan (di dunia, maka di akhirat nanti ia akan diberi pembalasan) di akhirat kelak (dan barang siapa yang berbuat kejahatan) di dunia (di akhirat, niscaya akan diberi pembalasan) di akhirat kelak.

question_en: Explain the following verses: 'The camels (al-'adiyat) are set forth in the morning, the sheep (al-muriyaat) in the evening, and the goats (al-mughiraat) at dawn. They leave their mark (atharna bihi naq'atan), and they gather (wasatna bihi jam'atan). Indeed, man is, in the sight of his Lord, ungrateful (lakaduun). And indeed, he is, of that, a witness (wahiu lahu 'alayhi shahidun). And indeed, he is, for the love of good, intense (wahiu lihubb al-khayri shadidun). Does he not know that when what is in the graves is brought out (bu'thira ma fi al-qubur), and what is in the breasts is gathered (hussila ma fi al-sudur), that his Lord, on that day, is fully aware (inn rabbahum bihim yawmi'idhin lakhabeerun)?'
answer_en: By Allah, the Exalted, I swear by the swift horses that charge towards the enemy, when their sound is heard from their swift gallop. It is not permissible for a creature to swear by anything other than Allah, for swearing by other than Allah is shirk. The horses that spark fire from the strength of their hooves due to their swiftness, are the ones that strike fear into the hearts of the enemies at dawn. They stir up dust with their gallop, trampling upon the ranks of the enemies. Indeed, man is disobedient to his Lord, and by his disobedience, he seals his fate. Indeed, he is intense in his love for wealth. Does man not know what he will face when Allah brings forth the dead from their graves for reckoning and reward? And all that was hidden in the breasts will be brought out, whether it be good or evil. Verily, his Lord is fully aware of them and their deeds on that day, and nothing will be hidden from Him.
question_id: (Sesungguhnya pada yang demikian itu) maksudnya yang disebutkan tadi (menjadi tanda-tanda) yang menunjukkan akan kekuasaan Allah swt. (bagi orang-orang yang beriman) kepada Allah dan Rasul-Nya. (Ingatlah, di waktu matahari sepenggalah) pada garis edarnya (terdapat tanda-tanda) yang menunjukkan akan kekuasaan Allah swt. (bagi orang-orang mukmin) bagi orang-orang kafir.
answer_id: (Demi Allah, sesungguhnya aku bersumpah dengan kuda) huruf Laa di sini adalah huruf Zaidah (yang sangat cepat) yakni kuda yang sangat cepat lari dari tempat-tempat musuh (yaitu kuda yang gesit) kuda yang sangat cepat marah bila mendengar suara (yang cepat di waktu berlari) lafal Jaa-an adalah bentuk jamak dari lafal Jaa-aanaanun, artinya kuda-kuda yang cepat; atau kuda-kuda yang cepat; atau kuda-kuda yang cepat; atau kuda-kuda yang cepat; atau kuda-kuda yang cepat; atau kuda-kuda yang cepat; atau kuda-kuda yang cepat; atau kuda-kuda yang cepat; atau kuda-kuda yang tidak dapat mengeluarkan dan tidak dapat; atau malaikat yang dimaksud adalah kuda yang lebih kuat; setan itu tidak dapat; setan itu tidak dapat; setan itu berani ia dapat; setan tidak dapat; setan tidak dapat; setan tidak dapat; setan tidak dapat ia dapat; setan dapat; setan tidak dapat; setan tidak dapat ia dapat; setan dapat; setan tidak dapat; setan tidak dapat ia dapat; setan dapat ia dapat; setan dapat; setan dapat ia dapat; setan dapat ia dapat ia dapat ia dapat memukul dengan kuat untuk dapat memukul dengan kuat untuk dapat memukul dengan kuat.

question_en: What is the Qar'ah? And what do you know about the Qar'ah? On the day when people will be like scattered moths, and the mountains will be like scattered wool. So as for those whose scales (of good deeds) are heavy, they will be in a pleasant life. And as for those whose scales are light, their mother (i.e., their soul) will be Hawa'. And what do you know about Hawa'? It is a blazing fire.
answer_en: The hour that strikes the hearts of people with its terrors. What is this striking? And what will inform you about it? On that day, people will be in their multitude, dispersion, and movement like scattered dust, and they will be like chaff that is thrown into the fire. The mountains will be like colorful wool that is spread out by hand, becoming dust and disappearing. As for those whose scales of good deeds are heavy, they will be in a life of pleasure in Paradise. As for those whose scales of good deeds are light and their scales of evil deeds are heavy, their abode will be in Hell. And how do you know, O Messenger, what this Hell is? It is a fire that is kindled.
question_id: (Apakah kamu mengetahui) Istifham atau kata tanya di sini mengandung makna menetapkan (tatkala manusia) yakni orang-orang kafir (adalah seperti anai-anai yang berterbangan) bergelimpangan (padahal gunung-gunung itu adalah seperti bulu yang dihambur-hamburkan) artinya bagaikan wool yang terhampar. (Barang siapa yang berat timbangannya) karena kekafirannya, maka ia akan menjadi musuh (maka mereka itu adalah penghuni neraka yang menyala-nyala).
answer_id: Pada hari itu manusia ke luar dari kuburnya dalam keadaan bermacam-macam, seakan-akan karena ketakutannya (kepada mereka), mereka berkata: "Apakah yang mengejutkan kamu (hai orang-orang musyrik) ini?" Dan pada hari itu manusia berpecah-belah menjadi beberapa macam debu, kemudian menjadi seperti debu yang beterbangan yang diterbangkan oleh angin ke dalam neraka.

question_en: Does the pursuit of worldly gain (takaathur) occupy you [so much] that you visit graves? No, you will surely know [the truth] soon. Then no, you will surely know [the truth] soon. No, if you had knowledge of certainty [of the Hereafter], you would indeed see the Hellfire. Then you will certainly see it with the [sure] sight [of the Hereafter]. Then on that day, you will be asked about the pleasure [of this world].
answer_en: Your preoccupation with wealth and offspring has led you astray from obedience to Allah. You have persisted in this until you reach the graves and are buried in them. This is not how you should be distracted by the abundance of wealth. You will come to realize that the Hereafter is better for you. Beware, for you will surely know the evil outcome of your preoccupation with it. This is not how you should be distracted by the abundance of wealth. If you truly knew, you would have turned away and hastened to save yourselves from destruction. You will see the Hellfire, and you will certainly see it. Then you will be asked on the Day of Judgment about every kind of enjoyment.
question_id: (Maka sesungguhnya kalian akan mengetahui) hai orang-orang kafir Mekah (berita Alquran) yaitu berita kebenarannya (pada hari itu, kalau kalian sungguh-sungguh mengetahui) bahwasanya hal ini adalah benar (benar-benar bahwa sesungguhnya kalian) bahwasanya hal tersebut adalah (benar-benar akan melihat neraka. Maka kelak kalian akan mengetahui) akibat daripada hal tersebut (sesungguhnya kalian akan mengetahui) akibat daripada hal tersebut (kemudian jika kalian mengetahui) bahwasanya hal tersebut (sesungguhnya kalian pada hari kiamat benar-benar akan ditanya) mengenainya hal tersebut (tentang kenikmatan neraka.")
answer_id: (Dan kamu sekali-kali tidak akan tergoda oleh harta bendamu) artinya kamu tidak akan terperosok di dalamnya (dan anak-anakmu akan mengira bahwa akhirat itu) yaitu surga (lebih baik bagimu). Menurut suatu qiraat dibaca dengan takhfif yaitu syin dengan tasydid sehingga bacaannya menjadi tasydid, artinya menjadi lebih baik (dan sesungguhnya kamu akan mengetahui) menurut suatu qiraat dibaca tahqiq dan tashil (akibat perbuatanmu yang buruk itu dan kamu tidak akan ditimpa azab) azab di dunia (di hari kiamat dan kamu akan ditimpa azab yang besar) yang menyakitkan di akhirat nanti.

question_en: And of the [Qur'an], the time [is near]. Indeed, mankind is in loss, except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience. Explain the meanings of these verses.
answer_en: By Allah, the Eternal, the sons of Adam are in loss and decline. A servant should not swear by anything except Allah, for swearing by other than Allah is shirk. The sons of Adam are in loss and decline, except those who believe in Allah and do righteous deeds, and enjoin upon each other to hold fast to the truth and to be patient in obedience to Allah.
question_id: Dan sesungguhnya manusia itu benar-benar dalam kerugian, kecuali orang-orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan amal saleh; dan sebahagian mereka menyembunyikannya, dan sebagian dari mereka memberi nasihat yang ma'ruf kepada yang lain.
answer_id: Demi Allah, sesungguhnya anak Adam itu benar-benar dalam kerugian, kecuali orang-orang yang beriman kepada Allah dan mengerjakan amal saleh yang diperintahkan oleh Allah kepada mereka dengan berpegang teguh kepada kebenaran dan melaksanakan segala larangan-Nya.

question_en: Woe to every slanderer, defamer, who amasses wealth and counts it, thinking that his wealth will make him immortal. No, he will be thrown into the blazing fire. And what do you know about the blazing fire? It is the fire of Allah, kindled, which reaches the hearts. It is closed in upon them, in outstretched columns.
answer_en: Indeed, the word 'adhab' (punishment) or 'wadi' (valley) in Hell is for one who is excessive in backbiting and slander, as was the case with those who used to slander the Prophet (peace be upon him) and the believers, like 'Amr ibn Hisham and Walid ibn Mughira, among others. This person's main concern was amassing wealth, thinking that by doing so, he had secured eternal life in this world and exemption from reckoning. However, he is mistaken, for he will be thrown into a fire that shatters everything thrown into it. And how can you, O Prophet, know the true essence of this fire? It is the intense fire of Allah, which penetrates from the bodies into the hearts. It is sealed upon them with shackles and long chains, so that they cannot escape.
question_id: (Kecelakaan yang besarlah) lafal Wailun merupakan kalimat yang mengandung makna azab; atau merupakan nama sebuah lembah di neraka Jahanam (bagi setiap orang yang membuat kerusakan) yakni banyak permusuhan dan kedurhakaan (lagi banyak menghitung-hitungnya) artinya banyak berbuat dosa (dan dia menyangka bahwa dirinya kekal di dalam neraka) dapat dibaca nashab atau nushuf, artinya neraka itu (maka ia akan dimasukkan ke dalamnya) yakni ia akan dimasukkan ke dalamnya (dalam api yang menyala-nyala) yakni neraka yang sangat panas apinya menyala-nyala (dan kalian sekali-kali tidak akan memasukinya) Ayat-ayat ini telah dinashabkan oleh Fi'ilnya yang keberadaannya diperkirakan sebelumnya.
